seed_pair.target: Le preguntaré si podrá ayudar el año próximo.
seed_pair.known: I'll ask him if he'll be able to help next year.

S0166: Mi nombre no es muy inusual.
My name is not very unusual.
S0167: ¿Qué necesitas hacer mañana por la tarde?
What do you need to do tomorrow afternoon?
S0168: Y entonces podré venir y ayudar más tarde.
And then I'll be able to come and help later on.
S0169: What do you want me to do?
S0170: Me gustaría que me dijeras lo que necesitas.
I'd like you to tell me what you need.
S0171: Do you want me to help you look for it?
S0172: Yes that would be very helpful.
S0173: No gracias, puedo manejarlo por mi cuenta.
No thank you I can manage on my own.
S0174: Can you understand what I'm saying?
S0175: ¿Qué quieres hacer el domingo por la mañana?
What do you want to do on Sunday morning?

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
